All patient evaluate use Movement Disorder Society-sponsored revision Unified Parkinson 's Disease Rating Scale ( MDS-UPDRS ) part III baseline ( one week surgery ) 6 , 12 24 month postoperatively . Stimulation parameter set : The first programming perform 3-4 week surgery . Bilateral contact cathode monopolar configuration . The initial voltage , pulse width frequency bilaterally 1.0-1.5 V , 60 μs 130 Hz individual , respectively . Voltage gradually increase stable level first , optimal efficacy achieve . Two week later , patient come back hospital reprogramming , voltage also first adjust optimize stimulation parameter . Pulse width adjust satisfactory clinical response unilateral symptom satisfy increase voltage frequency . Pulse width increase 90 μs necessary ( e.g . severe tremor ) . Groups : Patients divide two group accord parameter setting follow-up . Group I : patient voltage adjustment . The pulse width keep 60 μs frequency 130 Hz constant throughout follow-up period . Group II : patient adjustment two stimulation parameter ( voltage , pulse width frequency ) follow-up .
